abstract set_duration(src: str, duration: float)¶

Set duration of the simulation.

Parameters

  • {str} -- event name (src) –

  • {float} -- simulation duration in seconds (duration) –

abstract set_monochronic(src: str, steady_state: Optional[float] = None)¶

Tell solver to use a monochronic source time function.

Parameters

{str} -- event name (src) –

Keyword Arguments

{Optional[float]} -- set the time for the simulation to reach steady state (default (steady_state) – {None})
